    Gog Extension Troubleshooting

    Gog Troubleshooting

    Tips and fixes for GOG-specific issues in Junk Store.

    This section deals with any problems specific to GOG integration ‚Äî from download issues to getting games to run smoothly through Junk-Store.

    I can't get GOG to run in Junk Store.

    Make sure you're using the latest version of Junk Store from the Decky Testing Store.

    You‚Äôll also need to reinstall dependencies by going to the About section and clicking ‚ÄúInstall Dependencies.‚Äù

    I don‚Äôt see any games in my Gog library.

    Check the following:

    • If you have more than one Gog account, make sure you are logged into the correct one.
    • Press X to toggle the ‚ÄúShow Installed‚Äù filter ‚Äî it may be hiding your uninstalled games.
    • Clear the search bar at the top ‚Äî any text here will filter your library.
    • Refresh your games list from the main Gog tab:
        Sliders menu > Refresh Games List
    • Reboot the Steam Deck
    • Log out and log back into your Gog account

    Updated: June 20, 2025
